short_summary: SPICT - Plusieurs catégories de ressources. IM/IT projects ; labour agreement levels Contracting Entity Name Depot
description: Based on the requirements of the TBIPS Solicitation # 4166, the Supplier shall provide Information Technology (IT) and Management (IM) personnel to work on various projects from the Treasury Board of Canada. Since it is a labour agreement based on the TBIPS Price Schedules. The labour agreement involves a duration of 1 year and the services will be delivered over a duration of 1 year. The contract becomes automatically renewable for one (1) more year unless either the Department or the Supplier gives notice. , between the Treasury Board of Canada; Department of [ ].
